summary: "For this research we used data from KYCC completed cohort from Jan, Feb, March 2019 (total users = 300k). About 50% of users stop going into transaction details 2 months after first usage. Users that continue to go into transaction details (on avg) do it ~16 times per month. As for spaces, roughly 20% of users that completed at least 1 txn (MAU) created 1+ spaces account within the first month of login  Also, about 50% of users viewed spaces within the first month of login activity indicating some interests/curiosity."
